dsOverview.title: Krishnamurti's GATE Tropical 300mb, 250mb, and 200mb Wind

summary.p: This dataset contains 100 days of tropical wind analyses for the 300mb, 250mb, and 200mb levels. These analyses were provided by T.N. Krishnamurti at Florida State University. The u- and v-components of the wind are contained in a 2.5-degree grid covering the tropical globe.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: FSU/METEO > Meteorology Department, Florida State University

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Upper Level Winds
